Replace.Text: [ICON_BULLET][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Ages last 70% longer. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]During a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Age, units receive +2 [ICON_MOVES]Movement and a +20% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength bonus. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Persian units move faster in hills and rough terrain. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strategic Resources grant +10 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production after researching Industrialization.
Pax Sinica

[ICON_BULLET]During a Golden Age, receive an additional +20% [ICON_RESEARCH]Science, [ICON_FOOD]Food, [ICON_PEACE]Faith output in all cities and +20% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE]Great Person generation nationwide. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Chinese Mercantilist tradition grants +40% [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Routes. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_WAR]Military Production is increased by 20% [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Naval Trade Routes to and from China yield an additional +25 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production, [ICON_GOLD]Military Maintenance is decreased by 30%, after researching Industrialization.

Row.Text: The mighty Chinese empire is now in [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pax Sinica[ENDCOLOR]! [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every tile in your empire that produces at least 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold produces 1 extra. +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People Earning Rate empire-wide.

Replace.Text: [ICON_BULLET]Each Scientist receives +3 [ICON_RESEARCH]Science, Engineer +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production, Merchant +3 [ICON_GOLD]Gold, Writer, Artist and Musician +2 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain +35% faster [ICON_CITY_STATE]Border Growth and gain +10 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture for every [ICON_CITY_STATE]City. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The amount of [ICON_RESEARCH]Science generated by [ICON_GREAT_SCIENTIST]Great Scientists is increased by 10% per owned [ICON_CITY_STATE]City. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military [ICON_GOLD]Maintenance is reduced by 25% and Units gain +15% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength when fighting outside Friendly Territory, after researching Industrialization.
Great Russian Soul

[ICON_BULLET]The first 4 [ICON_CITIZEN]Citizens in your cities don't generate [ICON_HAPPINESS_4]Unhappiness. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+6 [ICON_GOLD]Gold and +4 [ICON_RES_CONSUMER]Consumer Goods from [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every owned [ICON_CITY_STATE]City grants an additive 10% Border Growth Rate bonus. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unit [ICON_GOLD]Maintenance Costs are reduced by 20% and all Units gain +15% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength bonus while fighting within their own territory, after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Units ignore terrain costs when [ICON_MOVES]Moving into any tile with Hills. [NEWLINE]No [ICON_GOLD]Maintenance Costs for improvements on Hills and half the cost for other terrains. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Andean Empire's mastery of the mountains grants -50% [ICON_GOLD]Maintenance Cost for all improvements. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_WAR]Military units can cross Mountains after the arrival of a [ICON_GREAT_GENERAL]Great General, after research Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]English [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities get a Level Up when founded, and only range from City [ICON_CITYBANNER_CITY_LV1]Level 1 to [ICON_CITYBANNER_CITY_LV4]Level 4. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units gain +15% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength bonus while fighting outside their own territory. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each City grants +1 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Route. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain +32 [ICON_RESEARCH]Science and +32 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture from every [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]International Trade Route, after researching Industrialization.
Revolutionary State

[ICON_BULLET]The [ICON_CULTURE]Culture cost of adopting policies is reduced by 15%. Gain +4 [ICON_TOURISM]Tourism output for all Great Works. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_WAR]Military Units gain +50% Experience. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units do not lose [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength when damaged, and French Artillery gains +2 [ICON_MOVES]Movement and +2 [ICON_SWAP]Attack Turns after researching Gunpowder. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_FONT_RED]The Revolution is imminent![ENDCOLOR] Ideologies are unlocked after building the first Art Salon.
Gott Mit Uns

[ICON_BULLET]Every 50 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production output in a city offer additional +10 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture and +10 [ICON_RESEARCH]Science output. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Generate [ICON_WAR]Great Generals 20% faster. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production is increased by 30% [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Land Unit [ICON_GOLD]Maintenance is decreased by 25% and gain a free Autobahn in Conquered [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities, after researching Industrialization.
Blood and Marble

[ICON_BULLET]+12 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production for [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production when constructing Buildings. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Roman Expansionist Ethos grants -33% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4]Unhapiness from the number of [ICON_CITY_STATE]Controlled Cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval units cost 25% less [ICON_GOLD]Maintenance after researching Industrialization.
The Gift from the Nile

[ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD]Gold and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production in every tile next to a river. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain +6[ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower per city. Receive +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production towards building Wonders. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Egypt and its magnificent capital grants +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production towards buildings in the [ICON_CAPITAL]Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The cost of [ICON_CULTURE]Policies is reduced by 15% and the amount of [ICON_HAPPINESS_4]Unhappiness from Population is reduced by 15%, after researching Industrialization.
Eternal Freedom

[ICON_BULLET]Receive a free [ICON_CULTURE]Social Policy when you advance to the next era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Polish Nationalist Fervor grants +15% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Bonus against Larger Civs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_WAR]Military Units do not lose their [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH]Combat Effectiveness after taking damage. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a 15% [ICON_RESEARCH]Tech Bonus towards an undiscovered Technology when killing units of an Advanced Civ, after researching Industrialization.
Punishment of God

[ICON_BULLET]+5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Pasture. +3 [ICON_MOVES] Movement for all Mounted Units, Tank Units, Land Hit-and-run Units and Helicopter Units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain [ICON_RESEARCH]Technology Progress on capturing [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mongolian Civilization does not require [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities to exist. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units [ICON_MOVES]Move Faster along Rivers and Hills; Every owned [ICON_CITY_STATE]City grants an additive +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1]Happiness Bonus, this bonus is increased by +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1]Happiness for every conquered City you own, after researching [ICON_RES_HORSE]Horseback Riding.

[ICON_BULLET]Gain [ICON_CULTURE]Culture when you build a [ICON_WAR]Military Unit (100% of the units [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units fight as though they were at full [ICON_STRENGTH]Strength even when damaged. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_PRODUCTION]Production towards [ICON_WAR]Military units is increased by 20%. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military [ICON_GOLD]Maintenance is reduced by 20% and [ICON_CITIZEN]Engineers yield +4 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]-50% experience needed to earn their next promotion for all units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities receive a free [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH]Ikanda. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_GOLD]Unit Maintenance is reduced by 15%, and gain +33% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH]Attack and [ICON_STRENGTH]Defence when fighting a Technologically Superior enemy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Melee Units receive the [ICON_WAR]March Promotion after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Land Melee units and Naval Melee units use no [ICON_MOVES]Movement to pillage, and pillage [ICON_GOLD]Gold equal to 300% of the damage inflicted on a city. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive triple [ICON_GOLD]Gold from Barbarian Encampments or pillaging [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Danes are a nation of proud seafarers; gain +2 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture and +2 [ICON_FOOD]Food from Coast Tiles after building the Smokehouse. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and [ICON_PEACE] Faith from friendly City-States increased by 150%, after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]When a city is conquered, gain a free [ICON_RESEARCH]Technology discovered by its owner. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If there are at least 5 [ICON_CITIZEN]Citizens left after capturing a [ICON_CITY_STATE]City, gain +1 [ICON_CITIZEN]Citizen in your [ICON_CAPITAL]Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each [ICON_CITY_STATE]City serves as a bastion of rich Assyrian Culture, gain +12 [ICON_CULTURE]culture from each city. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_4]Unhappiness caused due to [ICON_CITIZEN]Population is reduced by 10% after researching Industrialization.
Sons of Hellas

[ICON_BULLET]City-State [ICON_INFLUENCE]Influence degrades at half the normal rate and recovers at twice the normal rate. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain 3 more [ICON_INFLUENCE]Influence (at Standard speed) per turn with City-States you could demand tribute from. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units require 33% less experience for promotions. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a 25% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Bonus against Larger Civs after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Defeated Barbarian units in encampments will join you. Receive [ICON_CULTURE]Culture, [ICON_RESEARCH]Science, [ICON_GOLD]Gold and [ICON_PEACE]Faith after destroying a city. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Borrow City names from other in-game Civs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Due to the nomadic nature of Hunnic Civilization, a [ICON_CITY_STATE]City is not needed to exist. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a 25% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength when fighting against Civs with better tech after researching Industrialization.
The Eternal State

[ICON_BULLET]+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production for every Quarry, Fishing Net and Forest. +8 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production from Fishing Nets and Strategic Resources. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% speed for [ICON_WORKER]Worker's Tile Improvement construction rate. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ottoman Administration grants faster city border growth rate. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Land Unit [ICON_GOLD]Maintenance is reduced by 30% after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Receive +25 [ICON_GOLD]Gold for each [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Route sent to your cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a Bonus [ICON_RELIGION]Religious Belief. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Land Units receive a +20% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat bonus when fighting on Desert Tiles. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive +15 [ICON_GOLD]Gold, [ICON_CULTURE]Culture, [ICON_PEACE]Faith and [ICON_RESEARCH]Science from International Trade Routes, after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Lose no [ICON_HAPPINESS_1]Happiness from a Luxury Resource if your last copy of it is traded away. All [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities receive a free [ICON_GOLD]Market. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval [ICON_GOLD]Unit Maintenance is reduced by 25%. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]30% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength when fighting Larger Civs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Route yields an additional +20 [ICON_FOOD]Food, after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production for every Specialist. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+40 [ICON_GOLD]Base Gold for every [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]International Sea Trade Route and +50% Range for Cargoships. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Carthaginian Mercantilism grants +30% trade routes. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Policy Costs are reduced by 20% after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Resource diversity grants twice as much [ICON_GOLD]Gold for Portugese [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Routes. All coastal Cities receive a free Harbor. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The rich Portugese Imperial and Naval Tradition grants -20% [ICON_GOLD]Maintenance Cost for Naval Units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive +20% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength when fighting against City States. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Merchants generate +2 [ICON_GOLD]Gold after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Cannot gain [ICON_CITIZEN]Settlers nor annex [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities. May [ICON_INVEST]purchase in [ICON_PUPPET]Puppet Cities and they grant full [ICON_RESEARCH]Science, [ICON_CULTURE]Culture Output and [ICON_FOOD]Food Growth. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The number of [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Routes is doubled as well as the [ICON_TOURISM]Theming Bonus in the [ICON_CAPITAL]Captal. A [ICON_INVEST][ICON_INFLUENCE]Merchant of Venice appears after researching Optics. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Venetian Mercantilism grants +30 [ICON_GOLD]Gold for every [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]International Trade Route. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a [ICON_RESEARCH] Technology from conquering a [ICON_CITY_STATE]City, after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]The first 3 [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities founded on Continents other than where Indonesia started, each provide 2 unique [ICON_GOLD][ICON_HAPPINESS_1]Luxury Resources. These 3 cities are free from [ICON_HAPPINESS_4]Corruption and Public Security problems, cost no [ICON_GOLD]Gold Maintenance and can never be razed. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Indonesias rich history and tradition grants -10% [ICON_CULTURE]Culture cost for Policies. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Centuries of navigating the archipelago grants +4 [ICON_MOVES]Movement when Embarked. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_RES_FISH]Work Boats grant +5 [ICON_FOOD]Food Output after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Founded [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities start with additional territory (6 tiles). [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All [ICON_CITY_STATE]Cities receive a free [ICON_FOOD]Granary. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Shoshone and their insightful leadership grant free [ICON_MOVES]Movement of units within City State territory. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_CITIZEN]Merchants yield +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Can embark and move over Oceans immediately. [ICON_CITYBANNER_CITY_LV4]Level 4 and [ICON_CITYBANNER_CITY_LV5]Level 5 Cities are treated as [ICON_CITYBANNER_CITY_LV3]Level 3 Cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a +10% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength bonus within 2 tiles of a Moai. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Polynesian naval tradition grants embarked units more [ICON_MOVES]Movement; Coasts yield +2 [ICON_FOOD]Food and +1 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture after building the Fale Tele. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Fishing Nets yield an additional +8 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture after researching Industrialization.
Huey Tlatoani

[ICON_BULLET]Gains [ICON_CULTURE]Culture for the Empire from each enemy unit killed (70% of their [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength). [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Aztec military innovation grants -20% [ICON_GOLD]Army Maintenance cost. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The rate of [ICON_PRODUCTION]Constructing Wonders is increased by 25%. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The value of [ICON_GOLD]Plunder by units is increased by 200% and killing enemy units grants 300% of their [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength as [ICON_CULTURE]Culture.

[ICON_BULLET]Rivers and adjacent terrain count as flat terrain for [ICON_MOVES]Movement. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Rivers extend length of [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Land Trade Routes as if they were roads. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+4 [ICON_GOLD]Gold for every Trading Post. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The number of [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Routes is increased by 15% after researching Industrialization.
Enlightened Despotism

[ICON_BULLET]Receive a free [ICON_GREAT_SCIENTIST]Great Scientist when you discover Writing. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Earn [ICON_GREAT_SCIENTIST]Great Scientists 50% faster. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Babylons great scientific innovation grants +30 [ICON_RESEARCH]Science for every [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]International Trade Route. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive 2 free [ICON_CULTURE]Social Policies per Era after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Receive +1 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture yield from every Specialist. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Units receive a 25% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat bonus when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than Ethiopia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ethiopian Civilization has harboured a rich religious tradition which grants an extra [ICON_RELIGION]Religious Belief. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units can [ICON_MOVES]Cross Mountains, and receive [ICON_RESEARCH]Science for defeating units of Advanced Civs, after researching Industrialization.
Population Growth

[ICON_BULLET][ICON_CITIZEN]Population Growth Rate is increased by 15% [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-30% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4]Unhappiness from number of [ICON_CITIZEN]Citizens. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Buildings in the [ICON_CAPITAL]Capital are 25% cheaper to [ICON_PRODUCTION]Produce. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Merchants yield +3 [ICON_FOOD]Food and the cost of[ICON_CULTURE]Policies is reduced by 20% after researching Industrialization.
Ordem and Progresso

[ICON_BULLET]Tourism [ICON_TOURISM] output is +100% during a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Age. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Earn [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE]Great Artists, Musicians, and Writers 100% faster during their [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Ages. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive -15% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4]Unhappiness from the number of [ICON_CITIZEN]Citizens. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The number of [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Routes is increased by 30% and the value of trade from Resource Diversity is increased by 100%, after researching Industrialization.
Second Rome

[ICON_BULLET]Choose one more Belief than normal when you found a [ICON_RELIGION]Religion. A [ICON_PEACE]Great Prophet appears after researching Writing. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Byzantine religious traditions grants +50% [ICON_RELIGION]Religion Spread from Trade Routes. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION]production towards Wonders. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_PRODUCTION]Production towards Buildings in the [ICON_CAPITAL]Capital is increased by 30% after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET][ICON_GOLD]Gold bonus for discovering a Natural Wonder (Bonus increased for being the first discoverer); [ICON_CULTURE]Culture, [ICON_HAPPINESS_1]Happiness, and tile yields from Natural Wonders are tripled. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The spirit of Spanish exploration granths 33% lower [ICON_GOLD]Naval Unit Maintenance. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_RELIGION]Religious pressure emnating from [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Routes tripled. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain an additional [ICON_RELIGION]Religious Belief after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PEACE]Faith per city with an adjacent unimproved Forest. The Bonus increases to +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith in Cities with 3 or more adjacent unimproved Forest tiles. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Celtic Druidism grants an additional [ICON_RELIGION]Religious Belief. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production for every Camp and Lumbermill. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain +500 [ICON_PROPHET]Faith and [ICON_CULTURE]Culture from kills after researching Industrialization.
Habsburgian Prestige

[ICON_BULLET]Can spend [ICON_GOLD]Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for 15 turns(starting from around 5000 [ICON_GOLD] Gold in the Ancient Era and the price will rise when entering a new era). [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Musician appears after researching Acoustics. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Austria's rich cultural history grants +3 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture from Cultural Buildings. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each City generates +35 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture after researching Industrialization.
Prosperity in Unity

[ICON_BULLET]The amount of [ICON_FOOD]Food, [ICON_CULTURE]Culture, and [ICON_PEACE]Faith from friendly City-States increased by 200%. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive +2 [ICON_GOLD]Gold from Specialists. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siamese diplomatic tradition grants the ability to annex long term City State allies for gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gifting a Great Person grants +500 [ICON_INFLUENCE]Influence with City-States after researching Industrialization.
Glorious Caliphate

[ICON_BULLET]+100% Range for [ICON_TRADE_WHITE]Caravans. [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Routes spread the home city's [ICON_RELIGION]Religion 300% more effectively. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture and +2 [ICON_PEACE]Faith from every Oasis. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Arab mysticism grants the ability to choose an extra [ICON_PROPHET]Religious Belief; [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Ages are 30% longer. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military Units do not lose Combat Strength after taking damage, and receive +15% Combat Bonus when fighting against an Advanced Civ, after researching Industrialization.
Empire in the North

[ICON_BULLET]Gain 500 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with a Great Person gift to a City-State. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When declaring a friendship, Sweden and their ally gain a +15% boost to [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE]Great Person generation. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The spirit of Swedish Innovation grants 33% more [ICON_GREAT_SCIENTIST]Great Scientists. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Scientists yield +3 [ICON_RESEARCH]Science after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Receive +2 [ICON_RESEARCH]Science from Specialists. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain +4 [ICON_RESEARCH]Science from [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE]Great Person tile improvements. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Korea's rich tradition of scientific and cultural progress grants +2 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture per Scientist. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Trade Route yields an extra 30 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]After researching Theology, receive a [ICON_RESEARCH]Science boost each time a [ICON_RESEARCH]Scientific Building/Wonder is built in the [ICON_CAPITAL]Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a bonus [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE]Great Person at the end of every Mayan Long Count calendar cycle (every 394 years) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mayan mastery of the jungles provides no [ICON_MOVES]Movement malus to Mayan units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The speed of [ICON_RAZING]Razing Cities is increased by 300% after researching Industrialization.

[ICON_BULLET]Units move through Forest and Jungle in friendly territory as if they were Roads. These tiles can also be used to establish [ICON_CONNECTED]City Connections and speed up [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]Caravans. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Land Units receive a 20% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Bonus when fighting in Forest Tiles. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production for every Lumbermill. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Farms yield +2 [ICON_FOOD]Food output after researching Industrialization.

Row.Text: Brazilian Soccer Players can only be created by building the Brazilian Football Pitch. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Brazilian Soccer Player can enter other nations' territory without an Open Border Agreement to generate a one-time [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism boost like Great Musicians. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]All other nations will also receive the same amount of [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism boost generated by the Brazilian Soccer Player.

Association Football is the most popular sport in Brazil. The Brazilian national football team has won the FIFA World Cup tournament a record five times, in 1958, 1962, 1970, 1994 and 2002, and is the only team to succeed in qualifying for every World Cup competition ever held. It is among the favorites to win the trophy every time the competition is scheduled. After Brazil won its 3rd World Cup in 1970, they were awarded the Jules Rimet Trophy permanently. But 365 days before World Cup 2014 began, Brazil's rank dropped to 22nd, an all-time-low position.

The Prophet is the unique prophet unit for Arabia. He can found or enhance a religion, construct the special Holy Site improvement and spread religion 4 times as the normal prophet unit. He can also conduct a trade mission in a City-State as the Great Merchant.

Prophets in Islam include "messengers", bringers of a divine revelation via an angel; and "prophets", lawbringers that Muslims believe were sent by God to every people, bringing God's message in a language they can understand. Belief in Islamic prophets is one of the six articles of the Islamic faith, and specifically mentioned in the Quran.
